_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: AIOStreams
author: contact@patatje.dev
description: An egg to easily run the Stremio addon, AIOStreams, on a Pterodactyl panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y git

npm install npm@latest -g

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

git clone https://github.com/Viren070/AIOStreams.git .

npm install

npm run build
